entry.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
entry.content:
{% pullquote %} Introducing Mr.Wyatt, the minion version of me. In his entire life so far, he allocates attentions on everything that seems attractive: {“ The Good, the Bad and the Ugly”}. In person, I would get him adquately prepared when he hitting the road, if I could. Apparently, that is not what happened. Enjoy your journey on planet earth, my dear Wyatt. {% endpullquote %}
